author: darkbluedarz
title: Worlds Tickets got scalped within moments of tickets going live. (Even with Mastercard)
body:
I am furious.

I emailed Riot a week ago, explaining that we have a China Expat Community that ran into issues buying tickets for MSI and previous LoL events. ***No Reply***

Tickets for the Semi-Finals & Finals went on pre-sale this morning for only those who have a Mastercard.

https://preview.redd.it/1t4x93n24bsf1.jpg?width=1170&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=b3d140806bb3d82b30bcc652d623c5355b16cc9b

***And they're gone...***

https://preview.redd.it/tt5jcc844bsf1.jpg?width=828&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=bf3c26c50239625aea83ed3ea2b7dca106c17380

Our group has tried all morning for an hour straight to get a ticket, and they got botted and are already on ***re-selling sites at x10 price***. Riot will say its linked to your passport, which does not matter in China. They don't care at the door of the event.

If you're thinking about flying to Shanghai for the event, don't bother. As an international visitor, you won't get a ticket. Shameful from Riot.

author: Angry_Hotel_Customer
title: Riot and Mastercard gifted me 10k RP and a TF skin for my Mastercard Twisted Fate skin idea
body:
Link with proof: https://imgur.com/gallery/bMZxEtP


Not too long after I posted my original "Mastercard Twisted Fate skin idea" where I talked about the new partnership between them and Riot and proposed an amusing way of bringing the fans on board, I got a message from u/RiotStags followed by an email from a Mastercard representative saying they wanted to gift me 10k RP and a TF skin.
Well today I received them I guess this means I've peaked. But also Mastercard are the sponsor of sponsors because I haven't heard of something like this happening before with League and sponsorships to regular fans.
I did not expect anything like this to happen when I originally posted (obviously) but this is such a welcome surprise and I'm really grateful and appreciative of both Riot and Mastercard for making this happen. It's the personal touches like these that make a good company in my opinion, connecting with their customers like this and giving back.

Thank mr. Mastercard


Edit: Link to original post: https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/9kzglw/mastercard_twisted_fate_skin_idea/

author: deathspate
title: Hot Take: While sponsorship integrations are jarring, I do think the Mastercard first item alert is actually pretty well done
body:
Basically the title. Although a lot of people may say that the jingle is very loud or jarring, I think for what it is and what it means to do, it accomplishes the goal pretty well. 

First item completions are pretty powerful, and I usually always forget to track these things myself as I get too absorbed into the game. 

The Mastercard jingle is pretty distinct enough to break my attention and bring my attention to whichever lane (usually jungle) had just gotten their item complete.

author: Angry_Hotel_Customer
title: MasterCard Twisted Fate skin idea
body:
Since league has decided to bring in more sponsors in the broadcast etc. I figured the best way players would accept this is with a skin. Here are my ideas on how such a skin would work with an ability rundown.



Passive - Loaded bank account: upon killing a unit, a MasterCard logo pops up and rewards him with anywhere between 1 and 6 bonus gold to his MasterCard account. Also instead of gold to spend at the shop he uses credit. (obviously)



Q - Wild Cards: MasterCard Twisted Fate throws three cards (bronze, silver and gold to represent the tiers of fans we have for our teams) dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass through



W - Pick a card: MasterCard Twisted Fate chooses a MasterCard from his deck, and uses for his next attack causing bonus effects.

Credit MasterCard- slows enemies just like it slows the speed of your bank account decreasing.

Debit MasterCard- gives the most damage and refunds mana because reasons.

Savings MasterCard- stuns the enemy hit as they cannot believe the incredible savings rates brought to you by MasterCard.



E - Stacked account: every four attacks, $50 bills will float around MasterCard Twisted Fate and his next attack will throw a big MasterCard at the enemy dealing bonus damage.



R - Destiny - MasterCard Twisted Fate predicts the financial misfortune of his foes, grants true sight and allows him to teleport across the map to give them the incredible good credit only brought to you by MasterCard.



Also this skin will only allow you to run the Acer Predator rune keystone

author: I_AM_LoLNewbie
title: With Riot's partnership with Mastercard, it would be nice to see a Riot co-branded Mastercard credit card with RP rewards.
body:
Like the title says, I would be interested in a card that offered RP back for purchases. I imagine it would also make sense for both Riot and Mastercard, directly linking the two companies with a product for LoL players.  

It also wouldn't be unprecedented for Riot to issue a co-branded card with rewards for their players. Previously Riot has partnered with Amex to offer the [RP+ American Serve](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/store-update/get-rp-rp-american-express-serve). However the long term RP rewards were lacking as it was a debit card. With the higher interchange fees that credit cards charge, Riot could potentially offer a more lucrative rewards program if they were to release a co-branded credit card.    

A potential rewards program could be something along the lines of 5 RP per dollar spent, with a 25000 RP signup bonus and custom LoL card design.  

I'd like to hear what the community thinks of the idea and if there is support for a LoL credit card.

author: Nandonut
title: Worlds finals Mastercard presale discussion thread
body:
Just thought I'd set something up and see how people are getting on in the hunt for buying tickets for worlds finals - I was in the waiting room on multiple devices and browsers (I saw people saying online different browsers works when it comes to their 'not more than one tab open thing') and currently my bar hasn't progressed at all on any device...

edit: [30 minutes in](https://imgur.com/a/mi055FF) and we're looking like EU's chances at getting outta groups

edit 2: 1 hour in I've just gotten in on one device - unsurprisingly it's saying no tickets currently available.

edit 3: while typing the comment above I was literally just about to say I'll try refreshing the page, and hit refresh and it showed 1 ticket available for floor and the next tier, but as soon as I clicked on it it wasn't available anymore...

author: devor110
title: I never want to see the Win Probability stat in any future tournament ever
body:
It adds nothing, predicts nothing and gets shown way too many times. I understand that it's a sponsorship fulfillment, but virtually anything else would be more welcome in its place.    
  
And even if it did work (even though it literally can't), I wouldn't want it because it would just be spoiling the result 10 or 15 minutes in

author: JarvanIVPrez
title: Riot sent me a replica Masterwork Chest to announce the new partnership with Mastercard
body:
https://twitter.com/atomicktm/status/1042418219292782592?s=20

For background, I’m a journalist in the space, and I write (almost) exclusively about League. I know this is really just a marketing ploy, but honestly it took my breath away a little bit so I wanted to at least share it on here. On the inside was a pamphlet with more info on the partnership, a mouse pad, and a Worlds hat. The box itself though is really the kicker. This definitely made me (more) excited about Worlds and proud to be a part of the game’s ecosystem, and I think it’s well done.

Edit: More angles - https://twitter.com/atomicktm/status/1042446131702194176
